amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the DoD from entering new biofuels contracts while sequestration remains law. Once sequestration expires or is repealed, it would amend current law to require the DoD to include calculations of any financial contributions made by other federal agencies for biofuels purchases.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 to prohibit the DoD from entering new biofuels contracts while sequestration remains law. Once sequestration expires or is repealed, it amends current law to require the DoD to include calculations of any financial contributions made by other federal agencies for biofuels purchases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 225 (Roll no. 356).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 225 (Roll no. 356).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Conaway.
